name: Blastoise
effect: (This card cannot be used at official tournaments.)
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: A brutal Pokémon with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high-speed tackles.

abilities.name: Rain Dance
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn, you may attach a Basic {W} Energy card from your hand to 1 of your {W} Pokémon. This Pokémon Power can’t be used if this Pokémon is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 more damage for each extra {W} Energy attached to this Pokémon (in addition to this attack’s cost). You can’t add more than 20 damage in this way.
